description: This file defines the schema for a notes database, including table creation statements, column names, indexes, and sorting order specifically for notes data management.

classes.name: NotesSchema
classes.description: A class defining constants related to the notes database schema, including table name, columns, indexes, and SQL statements for creating the table and indexes.

methods.name: NotesSchema._
methods.description: A private constructor to prevent instantiation of the utility class.

calls: CREATE INDEX idx_notes_is_pinned_updated_at ON notes(is_pinned, updated_at);
